actionTemplate.title: Qing Petal Lip B (Fuller Petal)
steps: Neutralize and sketch a petal outline with lip liner
Fill: deeper inside, lighter toward the edge
Soften the border with a lip brush for rounded petals
Clean up, blot, and touch up if needed

rationaleTemplate: Great when you need more control: outline first, then gradient.
Rounded edges make the lips look fuller.
